full_text: RE: MCC Visit Thursday From [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) To [b(6); b(7)(C)] Date 2019/08/14 12:18 Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822 [b(6); b(7)(C)] Two additional people from DOJ will join the visit: [b(6); b(7)(C)] In addition [b(6); b(7)(C)] has asked that the new acting warden join the tour. Let me know if you have any questions, thanks. From: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 4:03 PM To: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov>; [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) Cc: [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) [b(6); b(7)(C)] @usa.doj.gov Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday If it isn't too much of an imposition, we ask that all visitors come to our front lobby for screening before admission. Thanks! >>> [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) [b(6); b(7)(C)] @usdoj.gov> 8/13/2019 3:58 PM >>> Yes, thank you. Where should we go? From: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 3:38 PM To: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov>; [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) Cc: [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) [b(6); b(7)(C)] @usa.doj.gov Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday Hi [b(6); b(7)(C)] It should not be a problem. Does 10 am work for [b(6); b(7)(C)] and the rest of his staff? Thank you, [b(6); b(7)(C)] [b(6); b(7)(C)] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row Page 16825

text_blocks.content: RE: MCC Visit Thursday From [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) To [b(6); b(7)(C)] Date 2019/08/14 12:18 Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822
Two additional people from DOJ will join the visit: [b(6); b(7)(C)] In addition [b(6); b(7)(C)] has asked that the new acting warden join the tour. Let me know if you have any questions, thanks.

From: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 4:03 PM To: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov>; [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) Cc: [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) [b(6); b(7)(C)] @usa.doj.gov Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday If it isn't too much of an imposition, we ask that all visitors come to our front lobby for screening before admission. Thanks!
>>> [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) [b(6); b(7)(C)] @usdoj.gov> 8/13/2019 3:58 PM >>> Yes, thank you. Where should we go?

From: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2019 3:38 PM To: [b(6); b(7)(C)] @bop.gov>; [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) Cc: [b(6); b(7)(C)] (USANYS) [b(6); b(7)(C)] @usa.doj.gov Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday Hi [b(6); b(7)(C)] It should not be a problem. Does 10 am work for [b(6); b(7)(C)] and the rest of his staff? Thank you, [b(6); b(7)(C)] [b(6); b(7)(C)] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content appears to be related to a visit to the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
